entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this morning and this afternoon. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 late this morning. High plus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy late this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 24 January 2023
